name: 10xer
description: Extension to connect Claude with the 10xer MCP Server for real-time event streaming.
long_description: The 10xer MCP Server extension enables integration with the 10xer MCP Server, allowing Claude to communicate via server-sent events (SSE) and proxy commands through a local Node.js server.

api_key.title: 10xer MCP Server API Key
api_key.description: Enter your API key generated from the 10xer MCP Server integration page. Visit http://localhost:8000/integrations/integrations to create or manage your keys.
